description: Unit tests for the Note model's serialization/deserialization methods and date formatting utility functions.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Model class representing a note with properties such as id, title, content, pinned status, timestamps, and color.

classes.name: DateFormatUtils
classes.description: Utility class providing static methods for formatting DateTime objects into various string representations.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point for running the test suite which verifies serialization of Note objects and date formatting functions.
